title: Effects of chronic treatment with metformin on brain glucose hypometabolism and central insulin actions in transgenic mice with tauopathy
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Verónica Hurtado-Carneiro, Yannick LeBaut-Ayuso, Esther Velázquez, Cinthya Flores-Lamas, Rubén Fernández-de la Rosa, Luis García-García, Francisca Gómez-Oliver, Juan Miguel Ruiz-Albusac, Miguel Ángel Pozo
